summary: Frontend testing completed for P0 crash fix and P1 features. All features verified working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 and P1 features verified working. Master Data page loads without crash. Treatments tab uses native HTML selects for Category, Subcategory, and GST Slab dropdowns. GST Applicable checkbox toggles GST Slab dropdown enabled/disabled state. P&L Report shows 'Professional inflows only' and 'Professional outflows only' labels. Bulk Upload dialog shows prefix and mobile_number in required/optional fields.

p0_crash_fix.master_data_page_loads: PASS - Master Data page loads without crash
p0_crash_fix.treatments_tab_loads: PASS - Treatments tab loads and displays treatment list

p1_treatment_gst_fields.add_treatment_dialog: PASS - Dialog opens with GST fields
p1_treatment_gst_fields.gst_applicable_checkbox: PASS - Checkbox present with Yes/No label
p1_treatment_gst_fields.gst_slab_dropdown: PASS - Native HTML select with options: 0%, 5%, 12%, 18%, 28%
p1_treatment_gst_fields.gst_slab_enabled_when_checked: PASS - GST Slab dropdown enables when GST Applicable is checked
p1_treatment_gst_fields.gst_slab_disabled_when_unchecked: PASS - GST Slab dropdown disabled when GST Applicable is unchecked
p1_treatment_gst_fields.category_dropdown_native_select: PASS - Native HTML select for category
p1_treatment_gst_fields.subcategory_dropdown_native_select: PASS - Native HTML select for subcategory
p1_treatment_gst_fields.keyboard_navigation: PASS - Category dropdown responds to keyboard navigation
p1_treatment_gst_fields.edit_treatment_dialog: PASS - Edit dialog opens with existing treatment data

p1_pnl_report_filtering.disclaimer_note: PASS - Shows note about personal transactions excluded

p1_bulk_upload_columns.download_template_button: PASS - Download Template button present and clickable

features_verified: P0 FIX: Master Data page loads without crash
P1: Treatments tab - Add Treatment dialog with GST Applicable checkbox
P1: Treatments tab - GST Slab dropdown (native HTML select) with 0%, 5%, 12%, 18%, 28% options
P1: Treatments tab - Category and Subcategory dropdowns use native HTML selects
P1: Treatments tab - Keyboard navigation works on native selects
P1: Treatments tab - Edit Treatment dialog works with GST fields
P1: Reports > Profit & Loss tab shows 'Professional inflows only' label for Total Income
P1: Reports > Profit & Loss tab shows 'Professional outflows only' label for Total Expenses
P1: Master Data > Patients > Bulk Upload shows 'prefix' in Optional fields
P1: Master Data > Patients > Bulk Upload shows 'mobile_number' in Required fields
P1: Bulk Upload Download Template button is functional
